affiliate.sew: Start Earning with Our Affiliate Program Now

contaceUsList.font: Sign up for our affiliate program and get your referral link.
Share your link on your website or other platforms.
Earn commissions from sales you and your sub-affiliates drive.

dontsList.font: Make misleading or false claims about Detpractice.com
Promote on platforms that have inappropriate or illegal content
Set up ad campaigns using our brand name, or putting our domain name in your ads' destination URLs

faqList.q: Who can apply for DET PracticeI's affiliate program?
faqList.a: If you are a creator that has an audience composed of students,a training institution that teaches Duolingo English Test,or an influencer,you can sign up for our affiliate program and earn money.

faqList.q: How do I track my commissions?
faqList.a: Once you've signed up for our affiliate program, you'll have access to your dedicated admin page where you can track conversions from your referral links.

faqList.q: Do I get a commission if a customer I refer subscribes or upgrades?
faqList.a: Yes, after a user signs up through your link, you earn a commission every time the user makes a purchase and upgrades.

faqList.q: What is the exact percentage of commission I can earn?
faqList.a: For the first 3 orders, you will receive 10% commission; for more than 3 orders, you will receive 30% commission.

faqList.q: What if a customer I referred cancels their purchase?
faqList.a: If a customer cancels a purchase or gets a refund for any reason, the commission you earned for that person will be deducted from your account.

faqList.q: When and how do I get paid?
faqList.a: We process payments on the 15th of each month for all commissions you have earned in the previous month. You can receive payments via PayPal.

faqList.q: What if I have other questions about your affiliate internet marketing program?
faqList.a: Just contact us at "support@detpractice.com" and we'll be happy to help you with any questions you may have.
